items.title: El Salvador and US negotiate prisoner swap with Venezuela
items.description: Some 250 Venezuelans deported from the US to El Salvador were exchanged for 10 Americans held by Caracas.

items.title: Three killed in explosion at Los Angeles police training facility
items.description: Federal agents are investigating, but authorities describe it as "an isolated incident" with no further threat to the public.

items.title: Colombian gold miners rescued after about 18 hours trapped underground
items.description: Eighteen miners are in good health after a 12-hour-long rescue operation, Colombia's National Mining Agency says.

items.title: Romance scam victim travels 700km 'to marry French beauty queen'
items.description: The Belgian turned up at the home of Sophie Vouzelaud in France only to realise he had been a victim of fraud.

items.title: Court orders Bolsonaro to wear ankle tag and puts him under curfew
items.description: A court in Brazil also bars the ex-president from using social media and put him under 24-hour surveillance.
